name: AWS Support
short: A service provided by AWS that gives you access to technical support and advice for your cloud services.
description: AWS Support is a one-stop-shop for assistance and resources related to Amazon Web Services. It provides a variety of plans to fit different business needs, offering technical support, guidance, and best practices. Services include 24/7 access to cloud support engineers, infrastructure event management, and response times as fast as 15 minutes for critical issues. AWS Support also includes AWS Trusted Advisor, which provides real-time insights to help you follow best practices for cost optimization, security, and performance.
